thread.title: 2018 GMC Terrain Debuts: Compact (and Premium) at Last
thread.title_full: 2018 GMC Terrain Debuts: Compact (and Premium) at Last

author: Alexander Stoklosa
title: 2018 GMC Terrain Debuts: Compact (and Premium) at Last
text:
-If rarity could be said to imply premiumness, then count GMC’s Terrain crossover as upscale compared with its close sibling, the Chevrolet Equinox. Since the Terrain nameplate was introduced in 2010, GMC has sold 700,000 of its compact SUV, while Chevrolet has sold more than 2 million Equinoxes since 2005—as long as you don’t count a five-year head start as cheating. READ MORE ›› 
-
